guideline.name: Annotation of CPIC Guideline for lansoprazole, omeprazole, pantoprazole and CYP2C19

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 19

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298272

text.html: Initiate standard starting daily dose. Consider increasing dose by 50-100% for the treatment of H. pylori infection and erosive esophagitis. Daily dose may be given in divided doses. Monitor for efficacy.

implications: CYP2C19: Normal PPI metabolism; may be at increased risk of therapeutic failure compared to CYP2C19 IMs and PMs

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298285

text.html: Increase starting daily dose by 100%. Daily dose may be given in divided doses. Monitor for efficacy.

implications: CYP2C19: Decreased plasma concentrations of PPIs compared to CYP2C19 NMs; increased risk of therapeutic failure

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298290

text.html: Initiate standard starting daily dose. For chronic therapy (>12 weeks) and efficacy achieved, consider 50% reduction in daily dose and monitor for continued efficacy.

implications: CYP2C19: Increased plasma concentration of PPI compared to CYP2C19 NMs; increased chance of efficacy and potentially toxicity

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298281

text.html: Initiate standard starting daily dose. For chronic therapy (>12 weeks) and efficacy achieved, consider 50% reduction in daily dose and monitor for continued efficacy.

implications: CYP2C19: Increased plasma concentration of PPI compared to CYP2C19 NMs; increased chance of efficacy and potentially toxicity

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298263

text.html:
Initiate standard starting daily dose. For chronic therapy (>12 weeks) and efficacy achieved, consider 50% reduction in daily dose and monitor for continued efficacy.

Other Considerations

The strength of recommendation for "likely" phenotypes are the same as their respective confirmed phenotypes. "Likely" indicates the uncertainty in the phenotype assignment, but it is reasonable to apply the recommendation for the confirmed phenotype to the corresponding "likely" phenotype.

implications: CYP2C19: Likely increased plasma concentration of PPI compared to CYP2C19 NMs; likely increased chance of efficacy and potentially toxicity

recommendations.name: Recommendation PA166298276

text.html: No recommendation

implications: CYP2C19: n/a
